name: DeadTruth: The Dark Path Ahead
description: DeadTruth is an episodic, first-person horror adventure, featuring a complex and emotional story, filled with dark and mysterious secrets. Are you willing to enter the unknown?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: * 32 bits systems are not supported.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 7 SP1/Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: * 32 bits systems are not supported.
